messages.text:
On 2011/11/26 15:25:24, bytbox wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Poke?

LGTM

hard to believe these matter, but sure.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8e8c4fb05171 ***

ld: fix memory leaks

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5434068

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

On 2011/12/07 16:49:38, rsc wrote:
> LGTM
> 
> hard to believe these matter, but sure.

IIRC, one or two were causing several megabytes of leaks (per-imported-identifier, I think?) - while fixing those, I figured I might as well clean up the rest.

On Wed, Dec 7, 2011 at 11:59,  <bytbox@gmail.com> wrote:
> IIRC, one or two were causing several megabytes of leaks
> (per-imported-identifier, I think?) - while fixing those, I figured I
> might as well clean up the rest.

wow, much more than i expected.  thanks.

subject: code review 5434068: ld: fix memory leaks
